name: CWYMP
description:
What does it mean to fall in your own eyes?

What does it mean to be a monster?

CWYMP is a short puzzle game about loss and guilt with heavy focus on narration.

Lose Take Control

Take control of Luen, a man turned into a monster as you traverse through multiple locations on your quest.

Thrive Survive

Survive various puzzling locations that force you to use your wits as you struggle to do what must be done because of your condition.

Hide Confront Your Demons

Confront your demons head on and learn the truth, however painful it is. Or maybe take the easier way out?
